segments.text: The boy is really going for it, isn’t he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how determined he looks, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling like crazy, but he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet he’s been planning this cookie heist for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, arms outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but the woman is too distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but they’re too focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s plate is ready to catch any falling cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the most exciting thing happening in this kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
